00030 from Koo.Common import Api
00031 from Koo.Common import Common
00032 from FormWidget import *
00033 from TreeWidget import *
00034 
00035 from Koo import Rpc
00036 
00037 
00038 def createWindow(view_ids, model, res_id=False, domain=None,
00039                 view_type='form', window=None, context=None, mode=None, name=False, autoReload=False, target='current'):
00040 
00041         if context is None:
00042                 context = {}
00043         context.update(Rpc.session.context)
00044 
00045         if view_type=='form':
00046                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00047                 mode = (mode or 'form,tree').split(',')
00048                 widget = FormWidget(model, res_id, domain, view_type=mode,
00049                                 view_ids = (view_ids or []), 
00050                                 context=context, name=name )
00051                 if target != 'current':
00052                         widget.setStatusBarVisible( False )
00053                 widget.setAutoReload( autoReload )
00054                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00055                 Api.instance.windowCreated( widget, target )
00056         elif view_type=='tree':
00057                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00058                 if view_ids and view_ids[0]:
00059                         view_base =  Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute',
00060                                         'ir.ui.view', 'read', [view_ids[0]],
00061                                         ['model', 'type'], context)[0]
00062                         model = view_base['model']
00063                         view = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute',
00064                                         view_base['model'], 'fields_view_get', view_ids[0],
00065                                         view_base['type'],context)
00066                 else:
00067                         view = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', model,
00068                                         'fields_view_get', False, view_type, context)
00069 
00070                 win = TreeWidget(view, model, domain, context, name=name)
00071                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00072                 Api.instance.windowCreated( win, target )
00073         else:
00074                 import logging
00075                 log = logging.getLogger('view')
00076                 log.error('unknown view type: '+view_type)
00077                 del log
